articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Victor Wembanyama MRI shows no ligament damage in left knee - NBA
articles.description: Victor Wembanyama will miss Friday’s game vs. the Indiana Pacers after an MRI showing no ligament damage in his left knee.
articles.content:
Victor Wembanyama will miss Fridays game vs. the Indiana Pacers.
SAN ANTONIO (AP) The San Antonio Spurs say an MRI showed center Victor Wembanyama sustained no ligament damage in his injured left kn… [+1670 chars]

articles.author: Adam Rittenberg
articles.title: Hoosiers handle Tide, book rematch with Ducks - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana quarterback Fernando Mendoza and the top-seeded Hoosiers won the Rose Bowl Thursday in convincing fashion, authoring a 38-3 victory over No. 9 Alabama to secure a berth in the College Football Playoff semifinals, where they will meet No. 5 Oregon.
articles.content:
PASADENA, Calif. -- As the crimson and cream confetti fell late Thursday afternoon, Indiana celebrated milestones ranging from recent to long term to almost unthinkable.
